snippet: The wayward birds could not be persuaded to follow a pilot flying an ultralight plane.
abstract: The wayward birds could not be persuaded to follow a pilot flying an ultralight plane.
lead_paragraph: An effort using ultralight planes to coax essentially orphaned whooping cranes all the way from Wisconsin to their wintering grounds in Florida has ended for the season. The problem this time isn't a possible violation of Federal Aviation Administration rules, but rather the birds themselves.

headline.main: A Whooping Crane Migration Will Finish By Truck
